channel.title: I need testscape help
channel.description:
I have No-Ip running and I put a check next to my no-ip. I have all my testscape files in the java sdk bin and I am running them from there. I first run the compiler and it works fine the code looks like this.
@echo off title TestScape Compiler javac *.java pause
Then I exit the compiler and run the runserver file. It works fine and code looks liek this.
@echo off title TestScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
Then I run moparscape and leave the IP blank like I'm supposed to and I log in And it says welcome to testscape. Then on another computer I run moparscape and type in my no-ip but can't.
My fire wall allows port 43594. My no-ip is ukescape.no-ip.info. I set my path to SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
It would be very nice if u can help. Thanks

item.title: I need testscape help
item.dc:creator: @uke_leader uke leader
item.description:
@uke_leader wrote:

I have No-Ip running and I put a check next to my no-ip. I have all my testscape files in the java sdk bin and I am running them from there. I first run the compiler and it works fine the code looks like this.

@echo off
title TestScape Compiler
javac *.java
pause

Then I exit the compiler and run the runserver file. It works fine and code looks liek this.

@echo off
title TestScape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Then I run moparscape and leave the IP blank like I’m supposed to and I log in And it says welcome to testscape. Then on another computer I run moparscape and type in my no-ip but can’t.

My fire wall allows port 43594. My no-ip is ukescape.no-ip.info. I set my path to SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

It would be very nice if u can help.
Thanks

Read full topic
